alert.note: Alert for Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 25 at 1:01PM MST until January 25 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow ongoing. Additional snowfall of up to 2 inches possible. * WHERE...Castle Rock, Limon, and Southern Lincoln County. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Roads are slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org
